snippet: In speeches delivered simultaneously thousands of miles apart, the candidates quarreled over the import of the latest jobs report and who would do a better job of keeping down taxes.
abstract: In speeches delivered simultaneously thousands of miles apart, the candidates quarreled over the import of the latest jobs report and who would do a better job of keeping down taxes.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and RICHARD A. OPPEL JR

headline.main: A Split-Screen Debate Over Jobs and Taxes
